other_tests.findings: No pre-lamin A accumulation was detected.
Marked nuclear morphological abnormalities were observed.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The abnormal phenotype could not be rescued with inhibitors of farnesyl transferase, geranylgeranyl transferase, or histone deacetylase.

other_tests.findings: Skinfold thickness at peripheral sites was below the 10th percentile, indicative of type A or partial lipodystrophy.
Serum leptin level was 1.6 ng/ml; insulin level was 1.1 U/ml.
GH therapy did not improve the short stature significantly and resistance developed at age 5 years.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Initial response indicated some height increase, but growth velocity decreased significantly after developing GH resistance.
